title: 新人4级撒金币~~~~~~~~~~~~标题长长长！！！
author: qqss2011
txt_content:
撒金币了~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



用“表情”搭东西，你会吗？
（貌似在水）
如：
       [pine] [pine] [pine] [pine] [pine] [pine] [pine] [pine]  
       [pine] [wood] [wood] [wood] [wood] [wood] [wood] [pine]
       [pine] [wood] [glass] [glass] [glass] [glass] [wood] [pine]
       [pine] [wood] [glass] [glass] [glass] [glass] [wood] [pine]
       [pine] [pine] [pine] [pine] [pine] [pine] [pine] [pine]
[sandstone] [sandstone] [sandstone] [sandstone] [sandstone] [sandstone] [sandstone] [sandstone] [sandstone] [sandstone] 
[sandstone] [red_wool] [orange_wool] [yellow_wool] [lime_wool] [cyan_wool] [blue_wool] [purple_wool] [magenta_wool] [sandstone]

replies.author: Give1329582145
replies.txt_content: 尼玛。一次撒完啊。蛋疼无比啊。。

replies.txt_content: 对不起，只撒了1次……搞错了，删帖吧！
